embed.title: Farming Formtion
embed.description: Tips on getting 3-star wins in level 8000.

fields.name: Tips
fields.value:
• Use Hoheheim.
• When calculating troops survival rate, the game counts troops spawned during the battles, so each Pirate Ship should be considered as **7-unit**.
• Focus on winning with speed and power.
• Avoid using sacrificial troops (Goblikazes and Voodoo Dolls).
• Daily earning at level 8000 caps at **6 million <:aowcoin:847363788566560798>**. To maximize earning, watch as much advertisements as possible.
